00019 DesignConfAbstractor::DesignConfAbstractor(QDomNode& abstractorNode):
00020 instanceName_(QString()), displayName_(QString()), description_(QString()),
00021 abstractorRef_(), configurableElements_(), viewName_(QString()) {
00022 
00023         // go through all child items
00024         for (int i = 0; i < abstractorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00025                 QDomNode tempNode = abstractorNode.childNodes().at(i);
00026 
00027                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:instanceName")) {
00028                         instanceName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00029                 }
00030 
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00032                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00033                 }
00034 
00035                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00036                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:abstractorRef")) {
00040                         abstractorRef_ = General::createVLNV(tempNode, VLNV::ABSTRACTOR);
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() ==
00044                                 QString("spirit:configurableElementValues")) {
00045                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00046                                 QDomNode confElementNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00047 
00048                                 // get value of the element
00049                                 QString value = confElementNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00050 
00051                                 // get the reference ID attribute
00052                                 QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = confElementNode.attributes();
00053                                 QString referenceID = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00054                                                 "spirit:referenceId")).nodeValue();
00055 
00056                                 // if one of the mandatory elements is missing
00057                                 if (value.isNull()) {
00058                                         throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:"
00059                                                         "configurableElementValue is missing in spirit:"
00060                                                         "abstractor"));
00061                                 }
00062 
00063                                 if (referenceID.isNull()) {
00064                                         throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:"
00065                                                         "referenceId is missing in spirit:configurable"
00066                                                         "ElementValue"));
00067                                 }
00068                                 configurableElements_.insert(referenceID, value);
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:viewName")) {
00073                         viewName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 
00077         // if mandatory elements are missing
00078         if (instanceName_.isNull()) {
00079                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:"
00080                                 "instanceName is missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00081         }
00082 
00083         if (!abstractorRef_.isValid()) {
00084                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:abstractorRef"
00085                                 " is missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00086         }
00087 
00088         if (viewName_.isNull()) {
00089                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:viewName"
00090                                 " is missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00091         }
00092         return;
00093 }

00120 void DesignConfAbstractor::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00121 
00122         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:abstractor");
00123 
00124         // if mandatory name missing
00125         if (instanceName_.isEmpty()) {
00126                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element instanceName is "
00127                                 "missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00128         }
00129         else {
00130                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:instanceName", instanceName_);
00131         }
00132 
00133         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00134                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00135         }
00136 
00137         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00138                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00139         }
00140 
00141         // if mandatory reference to abstractor is missing
00142         if (!abstractorRef_.isValid()) {
00143                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:abstractorRef"
00144                                 " missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00145         }
00146         else {
00147                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:abstractorRef");
00148                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &abstractorRef_);
00149         }
00150 
00151         // if there are any configurable elements
00152         if (configurableElements_.size() != 0) {
00153                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:configurableElementValues");
00154 
00155                 for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = configurableElements_.begin();
00156                                 i != configurableElements_.end(); ++i) {
00157 
00158                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:configurableElementValue");
00159                         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:referenceId", i.key());
00160                         writer.writeCharacters(i.value());
00161                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:configurableElementValue
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:configurableElementValues
00165         }
00166 
00167         if (viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00168                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:viewName "
00169                                 "missing in spirit:abstractor"));
00170         }
00171         else {
00172                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:viewName", viewName_);
00173         }
00174 
00175         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:abstractor
00176 }
